global.title: U-Dig It AI Multi-Language Localization
global.description: Framework for auto-translating and localizing funnels, emails, and campaigns across languages and regions.
global.guardrails: Translations must preserve brand tone, adapt idioms culturally, and remain compliant with local laws.

brand_terms.rule: Keep product names in English unless specified

integration.toggle: Users can select language from site header/footer
integration.auto_detect: Default language auto-detected via browser or geo-IP
integration.crm_storage: Store customer language preference for personalized campaigns
integration.reporting: Segment conversions and churn by language in reporting_dashboard_spec.json
